channel.title: Server error when adding duel arena landscape
channel.description: I made a duel arena map with landscape editor, and it loaded perfectly into my client, but when I added the the landscape file into my server, I got this error. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1763804/errar.bmp[/img] Anybody know the solution to my problem?

item.title: Server error when adding duel arena landscape
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

[quote=“Crooks, post:10, topic:419671”]Maybe because you use “type 1”… try set it at 0?
good luck[/quote]
lol You think so? Idk what the “type” means, I just copied and pasted one of the objects that were already there, and changed the id and coords. I’ll give it a try, thanks.
Edit: Worked, thanks a lot repped

Read full topic
item.source: Server error when adding duel arena landscape

item.title: Server error when adding duel arena landscape
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:8, topic:419671”]All objects are in conf folder (use 7zip), unless your using DarkQuest src you will use commands.[/quote]Alright, then I’m doing something wrong. Say I wanted to add the beds and shit into the lobby, would I just put this code in the GameObjectLoc.xml file? <GameObjectLoc> <id>1161</id> <x>116</x> <y>733</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1161</id> <x>119</x> <y>733</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1161</id> <x>122</x> <y>733</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1161</id> <x>125</x> <y>733</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1161</id> <x>128</x> <y>733</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>129</x> <y>732</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>126</x> <y>732</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>123</x> <y>732</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>120</x> <y>732</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>117</x> <y>732</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>114</x> <y>732</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1161</id> <x>116</x> <y>726</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1161</id> <x>119</x> <y>726</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1161</id> <x>122</x> <y>726</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1161</id> <x>125</x> <y>726</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1161</id> <x>128</x> <y>726</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>129</x> <y>725</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>126</x> <y>725</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>123</x> <y>725</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>120</x> <y>725</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>117</x> <y>725</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1171</id> <x>114</x> <y>725</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1147</id> <x>111</x> <y>744</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1147</id> <x>111</x> <y>752</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1147</id> <x>133</x> <y>752</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc> <GameObjectLoc> <id>1147</id> <x>133</x> <y>744</y> <direction>0</direction> <type>1</type> </GameObjectLoc>
Because, that’s what I did, and I got an error.
If you have skype, add me (knifeparty9) Thanks for all the help so far

item.title: Server error when adding duel arena landscape
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:6, topic:419671”]Look server sided for uhh max height or something for the map. World class or Formulae class. I think that might be the problem.

Mind showing a pic of what the duel arena looks like?[/quote]I’ll make a short vid when I finish adding the objects, in like an hour or so.

[size=15pt]Edit: You any good with adding objects and shit? I’m kinda confused with it, it seems real basic, but then when I actually do add the objects, I get errors when I run it.[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Server error when adding duel arena landscape
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:4, topic:419671”]did you create an area from scratch?[/quote]Yea, it was over water, so I cleared the tiles in the sector, then made the area. I deleted that landscape, and started on another one, putting the duel arena in a lower part of Al Kharid, and it worked just fine.

item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:2, topic:419671"]It seems that your server throws an exception, because something went wrong with loading the sections.[/quote] I got that much, I just don’t know why it isn’t loading the section :\ Could it have been out of bounds? Just a thought.
